name: Slow Cooker Mexican Meat
ingredients: 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. gr. cayenne pepper
1 tsp. black pepper 1/3 c hot sauce
2 Tbsp. olive oil 1 tsp. garlic powder
1 onion chopped 1 1/4 c. diced green chilies
steps: Great for Tacos, Burritos, Tostados, Salads
Thin roast of fat and season with salt and pepper. Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat and sear meat on all
sides. Transfer to slow cooker and add all other ingredients into a bowl, mix and pour over meat. Add enough
water to cover 1/4 of the roast. Cover and cook on high for 6 hours. Check often to make sure there is always at
least a small amount of water. Reduce to low and cook for 2-‐4 hours or until meat falls apart. Shred and add
